channel.title: [317]Burning Isle[317]
channel.description:
I have been re working an Allstarscape source for the past few weeks, and it is coming along pretty well. I am only about 5% done on coding it, so tell me what you guys think. Yes I know, Allstar is a horrible source to start from since it is so unstable, but I am working on getting rid of all of the unnecessary junk that is in the server files. Here is a list of stuff that I have already done.
New Home Area New Train Area Added NPC's and NPC drops in Train Area Modified Kalphite Queen, Made entire KQ area safe. Made entire server portal based, no teleporting. Slow training (15 EXP per damage) Slow Money Gaining (Hard to get money) Hard to get drops Added New Barrows System
Working on adding new things such as:
Adding New Minigames Working on also making a 508 client so it can have custom items and newer Runescape items such as Dragon Claws. More To Come
Here Are Some Pics:
Home Area: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/HomeArea.jpg[/img]
Shop Area: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/ShoppingArea.jpg[/img]
Train Area: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/TrainArea.jpg[/img]
PK Area: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/PkArea.jpg[/img]
KQ Area: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/KalphiteQueenArea.jpg[/img]
Portal Area: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/PortalArea511.jpg[/img]
Barrows Area: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/BarrowsArea.jpg[/img] ^ New system. Have to get the set of keys to open up the chest. 4 sets of keys, 4 sets of chests.
3rd Age Minigame: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/3rdAgeArea.jpg[/img]
New PK Reward System: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/PKRewardSystem.jpg[/img]
Will update when things are changed, please leave some comments! Also please don't flame. I honestly don't care if you are a better coder than me.
EDIT: Woops forgot to put in credits...
90% To Allstar 10% To Me

item.title: [317]Burning Isle[317]
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

I may actually look into a team for development team, but before I do that I have to ask for permission from staff first, plus I am doing other things at the moment, so I will let you guys know right now. Just wondering, is there anyone out there that would actually like to be a part of the development team?

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Burning Isle[317]
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Wow thanks everyone for the positive comments. Does anyone know anything that I could add to the server? Like a mini-game or something?
For fire cape, I am going to have a different mini-game, something other than the fire pits. Everyone uses that, and in my opinion, it is boring. So I am going to add something different in for fire cape.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Burning Isle[317]
item.dc:creator: @Zeroh Zeroh
item.description:
@Zeroh wrote:

koopa king:

Hmmm, I could make it so that when you kill monkeys of a higher level, you get more bananas. I would also have to make them stackable. I could also make it so that when you talk to a guy and you have enough bananas, a thing similar to a lottery takes place. I don’t know. I may add this in one day. Thank you for your contribution though.

No problem glad I can help. Who know’s if you keep this up you will have a lot of people playing your server good luck. Keep up the great work.

Read full topic
